Package com.cyberfront.crdt.operations

The com.cyberfront.crdt.operation package contains an abstract base class (AbstractOperation) and four operations which can be performed on the JSON object.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractOperation
    The AbstractOperation class is intended to be a base / abstract class for the set of operations which would normally be expected to be performed on a persistence store.
    CreateOperation
    The CreateOperation encapsulates the creation of a new JSON document in the CRDT.
    DeleteOperation
    The DeleteOperation encapsulates the deletion of a JSON document in the CRDT.
    GenericOperationManager<T>
    The Class GenericOperationManager provides a mechanism for managing java types as a CRDT by wrapping an object by a collection of operations on that object.
    OperationManager
    This is the base class for wrapping AbstractOperations.
    ReadOperation
    The ReadOperation encapsulates the reading a JSON document from the CRDT.
    UpdateOperation
    The UpdateOperation encapsulates the creation of a new JSON document in the CRDT.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractOperation.OperationType
    The Enum OperationType lists the types of operations which comprise the types of operations which can be performed on JSON objects
    OperationManager.StatusType
    The Enum StatusType.

Package com.cyberfront.crdt.operations Description

The com.cyberfront.crdt.operation package contains an abstract base class (AbstractOperation) and four operations which can be performed on the JSON object. Thes operations are CreateOperation, ReadOperation, UpdateOperation and DeleteOperation.
